text: Joroinen is a municipality in Northern Savonia, Finland. As of January 2014, over 5,200 people lived there. Neighbouring municipalities are Juva, Leppävirta, Pieksämäki, Rantasalmi and Varkaus. Joroinen was established in 1631. The nearest airport is in Varkaus.Factum, part 3, page 147, Finnish 003 1 398 ==Nearest cities== * Varkaus – 16 kilometres * Rantasalmi – 35 kilometres * Pieksämäki – 40 kilometres * Mikkeli – 70 kilometres * Savonlinna – 80 kilometres ==References== == Other websites == * The official page Category:Municipalities of North Savo Category:1631 establishments Category:17th-century establishments in Finland Category:1630s establishments in Europe
title: Joroinen
